title: Amy on the lips
brief_description: An edited version of the feature film “Amy” starring Jenny Agutter and Barry Newman. Shows the attempts by one woman to teach deaf children to speak at the turn of this century. Suitable for Upper Primary, Early Secondary students. No other credits available.
